title: Stop and Go
desc:
Post 2343
- Pick a color, the host randomly picks three others.
- While active, all colors picked are always able to be played (<:green:1106234108042031166>) or prevented to be played (<:red:1106234051129507932>) depending on this card's color.
- Whenever a <:green:1106234108042031166> or <:red:1106234051129507932> card is played, it changes this card's permission, if a card has both, it changes to the one not currently in.
- Once a <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card is played, the player will be prompted to remove this effect, they may pick yes or no.
